metadata.title: CVE-2020-5254 on Ubuntu 22.04 ESM (jammy) - medium
metadata.description:
In NetHack before 3.6.6, some out-of-bound values for the hilite_statusoption can be exploited. NetHack 3.6.6 resolves this issue.

    Update Instructions:

    Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2020-5254` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
    by updating your system to the following package versions:

nethack-common - 3.6.6-1
nethack-console - 3.6.6-1
nethack-qt - 3.6.6-1
nethack-x11 - 3.6.6-1
Available with Ubuntu Pro: https://ubuntu.com/pro

criterions.comment: nethack package in esm-apps/jammy, is related to the CVE in some way and has been fixed (note: '3.6.6-1').
